embed.description: Hey guys it's my first Full AP Sejuani Montage. Hope u all enjoy, and if u did then please like, share & subscribe it help me out alot. Thanks for watching & big thanks to my Editor Makani! Check his channel he is rly nice Lee Sin player :D.

replies.body:
I used to play AP Sej pre-Rework and was reliably effective for the psychological impact, always soloing the enemy marksman. The rework was aimed to avoid AP Sejuani; then I moved into tank and still is probably my most successful jungler; Grasp of Und. was a total refresh on the champion imo.

Was this montage made after the release of Echo in the jungle?
it was before the echo jungle item come :( but i think for most champs its nice but for seju its a bit nerf
runen echo, cdr boots, rabadons/zhonyas, lyandris/void staff, sometimes abyssal :D

> [{quoted}](name=Sashuani,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=wmAgr8zE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-01-25T10:20:46.478+0000)
>
> runen echo, cdr boots, rabadons/zhonyas, lyandris/void staff, sometimes abyssal :D

thx! nice video btw!
ahaha io la gioco ibrida con la trinity, andando quasi sempre full damage e devo dire che i danni sono ottimi, oggi la provo full ap :D
